Scripts Workspace - Custom Instructions

This workspace is organized for managing various types of scripts including bash, python, and utility scripts.

## Project Structure
- `bash/` - Shell scripts for automation and system tasks
- `python/` - Python scripts for data processing and utilities
- `utils/` - General utility scripts and helpers
- `config/` - Configuration files and templates

## Guidelines
- Keep scripts well-documented with comments
- Use meaningful file names that describe the script's purpose
- Add execution permissions to bash scripts
- Include usage examples in script headers
- Test scripts before committing

## Status
Project successfully created and ready for use.
